data.actual_result: You don't see the "Edit Channel" option despite being able to manage channel permissions
data.expected_result: You see the "Edit Channel" option because you can edit channel permissions
data.short_description: Edit channel option does not appear when long pressing a channel when you have only Manage Roles permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server owner give you only the Manage Roles permission - Go to a channel you can edit the permission overrides for, and tap the channel name to open the overview - Verify that you see the channel permissions section in the overview - Close out of the channel overview and open the channel list - Long press the channel and observe the options that pop up
